about_the_game:
Many years ago, demons, monsters, goblins and dragons had invaded the world.

Many creatures, from where and how they came, were killing the people and reigning in the lands they occupied.
Until a very talented wizard shows up.

This sorcerer sealed the main demon Azazil and all creatures with a spell called the death spell and imprisoned him in a pandora's box in a room of a vast mountain.

And the price was the death of the mage.
And the world was at peace again.

Centuries have passed and no one, except for very rare people, was even aware of the existence of these creatures.
Until a treasure hunter discovers the hidden cave and opens Pandora's box..



Ares is a warrior medieval people, his wife died many years ago, lives with a son and has no magic abilities.
He carries the holy spirit of the sorcerer whose son died many years ago,and no one knows about it.

Ares is injured when demons attack their village during a walk with his son, and his son is kidnapped by a demon.
Azazil is aware of this soul and learns from the diamond ball that this soul is in a child, but he does not know who it is.

If the child dies, Azazil dies at the same time. The magic of the wizard who imprisoned him in Pandora's box circulates in his blood.
The devils are gathering all the children in the villages. Azazil wants to detect the child with his own magic and neutralize this spell.

Then, a creature that takes Ares' son to the temple is shot by an archer and the child falls into the middle of a mountain, lonely and helpless.

Ares seeks the help of a most talented and knowledgeable wizard to find his son and avenge all that has happened.
and he goes on this way, his magic ability develops over time

Will Ares find his son?

Will he save the world?

What will happen to other peoples?

Is he alone?



  • Different scenarios for each different nationality with shield and flag selection and customizable at start.
  • Many side quests outside the main story such as fishing, riding horses, helping a villager, digging a field.
  • 87 different melee weapons such as Ax, Sword, Halberd, Bardiche, Bilhook, Dagger, Shield, Heavy Sword, Mace, Messer, Partisan, Angled Axe, Sax, Spear, Voulge, Warhammer and Zweihander
  • More than 50 magic abilities such as Ice and Death Rain Strike
  • A beautiful and realistic world with the best graphics and many views
  • Collectable Collectibles (gold, parchment, memories, diaries, etc.)
  • With the Advanced Crafting System, the system of producing elixirs from collectible mushrooms and gaining life
  • Climbable walls, many accessible houses
